title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Leader, Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications and 
Minister for Transport) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (leader minister environment climate communication minister transport) order 2023

title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is 
the leader of a political party registered in the Register of Political Parties and 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications with effect from 
17 December 2022.
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser minister government leader political party registered register political party minister environment climate communication effect 17 december 2022

title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is 
the leader of a political party registered in the Register of Political Parties and 
Minister for Transport with effect from 17 December 2022. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [168] 3
text_norm: 3 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser minister government leader political party registered register political party minister transport effect 17 december 2022 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th march 2023 168 3
